item.title: Reactive File Processing with MQTT: Spring Boot vs Quarkus – Part 1
item.author: Kathiravan Muthaiah
item.description: Part 1 of a series comparing Spring Boot and Quarkus for reactive file processing using MQTT, Project Reactor, and Mutiny with Dockerized microservices.
